entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Potential telemetry cleanup logic error - unsent telemetry events buildup #41796
  • Reenable templating tests for windows #41795
  • Using SDK compiler in torn builds #41791
    9.0.1xx
  • NoWarn the new .NET SDK netstandard1.x warning doesn't work #41787
  • After installing the .NET 9.0 Preview 6 SDK, failed to install wasm-experimental/wasm-tools workload with error "Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current' version '9.0.0-preview.6.24319.1' is lower" #41777
  • [NETSDKE2E] With Net9 preview 6 installed, running `dotnet razor.dll' failed after opening http://localhost:5000 via browser. #41776

Closed

  • Can't install maui workload on Mac #38653
  • `dotnet workload` always installs maui workload as root. This is making it impossible to build a project as a regular user on Manjaro/Arch Linux #40692
  • GenerateAssemblyInfo + globbing cause nested csproj build failure #2278
    Discussion
  • [Mac/Linux]After installing SDK 8.0.303 (July Update), wasm tools workload installation failed: Version 8.0.7 of package microsoft.net.runtime.webassembly.sdk is not found in NuGet feeds. #41715

PullRequests

Created

  • Obtain internal runtime SAS tokens via federated creds #41797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable templating tests on windows to unblock PR builds #41794
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Plan for addressing torn SDK builds #41790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use testing razor build #41778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41698
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop generating useless .dll.configs #41738
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid crossgen for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic #41731
    untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41792
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Create 0001-define-runtime-dependencies.patch #41788
    source-build
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Add warning when targeting netstandard prior 2.0 #41710
    Servicing-consider, Area-NetSDK
  • Containers telemetry #41747
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.4xx

Updated

  • Update ILLink team name #41734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41716
  • Update package table for preview 6 #41772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow runtime binary into the VMR #41736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix userlocal #41735
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Error condition fix Fixes #40297 #41741
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • rename SDK_CONTAINER_* to DOTNET_CONTAINER #41769
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Prefer the portable ILCompiler when publishing for the portable RID on a source-built SDK. #41754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reenable passed tests with skip attribute set as string #41753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Avoid reinstall tool already installed #41746
    untriaged, Area-Tools
